title: 23: No Such Thing As A Yawning Psychopath
content: This week in the QI office Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Anna (@nosuchthing) and Alex (@alexbell) discuss a scream louder than the Big Bang, pigeon-shooting physicists, accidental porn, yawning your soul away, and why a beard in battle is a bad idea.
contentSnippet: This week in the QI office Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Anna (@nosuchthing) and Alex (@alexbell) discuss a scream louder than the Big Bang, pigeon-shooting physicists, accidental porn, yawning your soul away, and why a beard in battle is a bad idea.
